<summary>What tools do you use for your research?</summary>
I use a MacBook Pro:

* [Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/): reference manager
* [Obsidian.md](https://obsidian.md/): note editor
* [VS Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/): code editor
* [Overleaf](https://overleaf.com/): text processor for research manuscripts
* [Quarto](https://quarto.org/): for Markdown presentation slides (and this website!)
* [Brave](https://brave.com/): internet browser
* [Toggl](https://toggl.com/): time tracker
and an Android phone:
* [Moon+ Reader Pro](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.flyersoft.moonreaderp&hl=en&gl=US): epub and PDF reader
* [Glance](https://github.com/chamburr/glance): syntax highlighting for macOS quicklook
